title: Flexbox
content:
## Containers


* Display : Flex
    - Elements are positioned next to each other
    - Container will remain Block Level


* Display : Inline-Flex
    - Elements are positioned next to each other
    - Container will change to Inline Level



#### Display: inline-flex
> display: inline-flex does not make flex items display inline. It makes the flex container display inline

![](image-kxgznnaf.png)


* Items will shrink if the box is too small for all of them to fit
